name: The Thrill of the Fight 2
summary:
🥊 The Thrill is Back — and Bigger Than Ever! 

Step back into the ring in Thrill of the Fight 2, the fully reimagined sequel to VR’s most beloved boxing experience — now fully released with a brand new singleplayer career! 

Whether you're a seasoned fighter or just getting started, this update brings fresh ways to train, compete, and dominate. 

🔥 NEW in the Full Release:

💥 Endlessly Replayable Career Mode -
Start as a rookie and fight your way through the amateur ranks to the world tournament!

🧠...
